				</label>

			</div>
          </div>

        </label>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

				</label>

			</div>
          </div>

        </label>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

				</label>

			</div>
          </div>

        </label>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>
<script id="addGameTpl" type="text/template">

    <form class="add-game" role="form">

        <div class="form-group row">
          <label class="col-sm-3 col-form-label" for="platform">Platform</label>
          <div class="col-sm-9">
            <select class="form-control" name="platform">
              <option value="default">Select a platform</option>
              {{#each platforms}}
                <option value="{{id}}">{{name}}</option>
              {{/each}}
            </select>
          </div>
        </div>

<script id="banTpl" type="text/template">

    {{#if banned_by}}
        <div class="ban-block yes">User is already banned</div>

        <p><strong>Ban notes:</strong></p>

		{{#if reference}}
			<p>Original report thread: <a href="{{reference}}">{{reference}}</a></p>
		{{else}}
			<p>Ban was automated, no report thread exists.</p>
		{{/if}}
    {{else}}
        <div class="ban-block no">User is currently not banned</div>
    {{/if}}

    <div style="display: none" class="response pop-alert alert"></div>
</script>
